title: Science Instructional Design Utilizing Creative Multimodal Metaphors

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Novice professionals in medical, legal, or technical fields who need to enhance their ability to metaphorically reconstruct complex scientific concepts for practical application. Learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessments in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can visually represent abstract scientific concepts using language- and gesture-based metaphors.
Learners can design creative problem-solving strategies through a multimodal metaphor generation process.
Learners can develop and assess metaphor-based instructional design prototypes based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
